creditline: Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888
markings: In graphite, verso lower right: Junius S. Morgan (Lugt 1536)
inscribed: Inscribed and signed in margin around oval: Spectandum dedit Ortelius mortalibus orbem. Orbi spectandum Galleus Ortelium. HG.in.

texts.textentryhtml: Junius S. Morgan [1867-1932, Lugt 1536]; bequeathed to Princeton University Art Museum, 1932.
